summary:
This is a small mod created for a user request in the Request Mod Forum.
It places a Woodcutters Axe in Belethor\'s General Goods Store in Whiterun. Also if you don\'t want to just take the axe Belethor will sell you one as well.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/BelethorTitle_zps48a97fd1.jpg[/IMG]

Hi,

This is a small mod created for a user request in the Request Mod Forum.

It places a Woodcutters Axe in Belethor\'s General Goods Store in Whiterun. Also if you don\'t want to just take the axe Belethor will sell you one as well.

Installation:

Install with Nexus Mod Manager

Manual Installation - drop the .esp in to your Skyrim\\Data folder.

I have only briefly tested this mod, seems to work fine.

I will not be doing any updates, bug fixes etc on this mod, it is purely at the request of a user.

As an alternative to all that hard work chopping wood with an axe, why not try SoulMasters Gather Wood Spell?

Available here:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27591/]SoulMasters Gather Wood Spell[/url]

SoulMasterII

[color=#00FFFF]Please take note: If you are using a pirated (ie non Steam enabled) version of the game, please do not leave comments about how this part of my mod or that is not working on your game! I am not prepared to waste my time trying to help you out with your illegal software! I\'m unemployed, but still manage to pay for my games (they are what keep me sane) so if I can, you should be able to as well![/color]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/sm0g9rv24znf_zps9d795d9a.gif[/IMG]
[color=#FFFF00]Please, DO NOT upload any part of my mods anywhere else![/color]
author: SoulMasterII
